meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Cox Lisa Schlitt Christy Karras Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7455.

td.p: Paul Cox, a portfolio manager from Austin, Texas
Lisa Schlitt, a microbiologist from Berwyn, Pennsylvania
Christy Karras, a writer and editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,600)

tr.td: WHAT COUNTRY ARE YOU FROM?
LITERATURE
1960s POP LYRICS
BEFORE HE WAS PRESIDENT
GERMAN FOOD & DRINK
JUST "ASP" ME
